price: Quienes después se desentiendan [y no cumplan con el pacto], serán los descarriados.
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
